content: Mujtaba Alam has marked this topic as resolved.
I doubt that works in NNG, it's still using Lean from 2019!

When I wrote the game I convinced myself that one would never need super-targetted rewrites because one could just feed explicit inputs into e.g. add_comm. And then of course users came with other solutions where this issue became a pain :-) I think conv was in core from the start though so you can always enter the totally undocumented in NNG conv mode :-)
